item.title: Hello World
item.description: Blogging Again Welcome to my new blog. I’m not completely sure how I’ll use the space, but I’m currently job searching. So I’m going to try to trick you into think I’d make an excellent addition to your data or software team. It will be fun though. Big thanks to Alison Presmanes Hill for her great blog post on how to get started using Yihui Xie’s great blogdown package.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
